name: Robot Rocket Rescue
description:
Robot Rocket Rescue

Made in a week for Mundane Jam (8 Bits to Infinity) for which the theme was Decay.

You are the last hope for humanity, a robot maintaining the launching platform for a rocket containing the few survivors of the Decay, a brutal bacterial invasion that has been gobbling up all of the structures on the planet.

As the humans prepare their launch, maintain the launch platform by replacing decaying timber, stone, and steel. Jump to reach higher levels.

Controls

KeyboardGampadMoveAD / QD / Arrow keysLeft-stick / D-padJumpSpace / W / Z / UpBottom face buttonAction (collect / place)J / Right CtrlLeft face buttonSelect pillar typeK / L / Num 1 / Num 0L1 / R1

Credits

Programming & Management by lilou_cormic (purplecable.ca)
Game Design & Music by Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com)
Graphics by Raindrinker (raindrinker.com)
Pre-made assets are credited in-game

Made in Unity 2020.2.4f1. Sounds with Bfxr.
Source code available on GitHub.
